Text: How stupid must somebody be, to download a 29GB torrent without having to disclose any contents?!

Trusted or not!
How ignorant must someone be to not recognise one of the largest draws on the 'interwebs'. 

MHRC is a collection of VA tracks; covers of songs by hard/heavy/industrial etc bands. 

Each album has multiple tracks. This is a collection of albums. 

To find individual items; check the 444 individual posts for them. 

And individual tracks ARE listed under files.
